project.name: HankSite
project.description: Construction of Henry's web site using several web technologies.

project.name: MetaSearcher
project.description: A search engine that queries other search engines. It is able to search hidden web databases.

project.name: SmartQuery
project.description: Implementaion of a small search engine using Yahoo!BOSS API. Use relevance feedback from users to improve search results quality. A command line based program.

project.name: Hsh (Hank Shell)
project.description: An UNIX/LINUX shell. Several common builtins, I/O redirection, pipeline and path name autocompletion were implmented. A customized shell for Henry to use.

project.name: Isolation
project.description: A simple board game played by one person with computer. Both GUI and command line versions available.

project.name: CRYPS
project.description: CRYPS is a scripting language that is used to write programs that heavily uses cryptographic operations. Both front-end and back-end compiler were implemented.
